TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServiceProvider

Docs.summary: Defines a mechanism for retrieving a service object; that is, an object that provides custom support to other objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This interface is implemented by a class or value type that provides a service to other objects.
The <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A> method of this interface obtains the object that provides the service.
TheIServiceProvider interface is implemented by a number of types, including <xref:System.Web.HttpContext?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetService(class System.Type serviceType) cil managed

Docs.param: An object that specifies the type of service object to get.
Docs.summary: Gets the service object of the specified type.
Docs.returns:
A service object of type .
-or-
if there is no service object of type .
